name: Rethawed
summary:
Breathe new life into Tony Hawk's American Wasteland on PC with reTHAWed, a comprehensive mod that injects the game with a massive dose of fresh content and long-awaited fixes.

Shred with a legendary roster of skaters, including those previously cut from the game or those that hail from other Tony Hawk's Pro Skater titles.

reTHAWed doesn't just expand your skater selection, it lets you customize them further than ever with a wealth of new clothing, hats, and deck options.

Experience classic levels from across the Tony Hawk's franchise all while battling
your friends online thanks to the mods restored and improved multiplayer functionality.

On top of that, reTHAWed tackles lingering bugs in the original game, introduces a custom launcher for ease of use, and even throws in widescreen support and adjustable physics for a fine-tuned skateboarding experience.

With frequent updates adding even more content, reTHAWed is the ultimate way to revisit and revitalize Tony Hawk's American Wasteland.
